about_the_game:
Dive deep inside a collection of relaxing tunes from the world of Puzzledorf. From relaxing pan flutes, to groovy bass lines and the ethereal harmonies of the ice world, let the music transport your soul, relaxing to the atmospheres of Puzzledorf.

This product is the soundtrack only and does not include the base game. You can hear short, preview versions of the songs on Youtube here. The commercial soundtrack contains the full, extended music tracks.

STEAM USER REVIEWS

"Can definitely chill to this." - Cross_

"Great relaxing soundtrack to have on in the background even outside of playing the game" - Nandos

STEAM CURATOR REVIEWS

"The music is amazing. I loved it." - Indie Blast

MORE ABOUT PUZZLEDORF

Puzzledorf is the land of puzzles! A place full of vibrant, block-pushing puzzles where simplicity meets surprising solutions. It's a game will help teach you how to solve puzzles as you go; a puzzle game for everyone.

name: Puzzledorf Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 490 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 or WAV available

reviews:
“The soundtrack is highly recommended if you want a very soothing soundtrack to relax to. Each level theme has it's own music now and they all fit like gloves.”
94/100 – CCGR
short_description: Immerse yourself in a collection of relaxing tunes from the world of Puzzledorf.
